argument.name: filename
argument.description: The name of the file to which output is being directed.

page.description: Override the main Alpha Five program printer output file.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.OUTPUT_FILE_OVERRIDE() method sets the name of the file to be printed. It returns the name, if any, of the file currently set to be printed. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
